<template>
    <v-container>
        <v-row>
            <v-col cols="12">
                <v-text-field
                    label="Search Pokemons"
                    v-model="searchQuery"
                ></v-text-field>
            </v-col>
            <v-col cols="12">
                <v-btn @click="toggleSortOrder" color="primary">
                    Sort: {{ sortOrder === 'asc' ? 'Ascending' : 'Descending' }} <!-- sortOrderが「asc」だったらAscending、そうでなければDescendingとする -->
                </v-btn>
                
            </v-col>
        </v-row>
    </v-container>
</template>

<script>

</script>

<style scoped>
.loading_area {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
}

.v-btn {
    margin-bottom: 20px;
}
</style>
